isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL® VT 365 DIESEL ENGINE - MANIFOLDS AND EXHAUST GAS RECIRCULATION (EGR) - Installation - Exhaust Manifolds and Tubing

note.para: When installing the exhaust manifolds, only use prevailing torque flange head bolts with an interference thread.

figure.caption: Figure 95. Right exhaust manifold bolt and spacer

step1.para: Apply antiseize compound to all bolt threads.

figure.caption: Figure 96. Torque sequence for exhaust manifold bolts

step1.para: Install the right exhaust manifold and eight M8 x 1.25 x 40 prevailing torque flange head bolts and spacers. Start with the second bolt from the rear on top. The hole diameter is smaller, therefore allowing alignment of the remaining bolts. Tighten bolts to the special torque and in the specified sequence .

figure.caption: Figure 97. Mounting bolts for right exhaust tube

step1.para: Apply antiseize compound to two M8 x 60 bolts securing the right exhaust tube assembly to the exhaust manifold flange with two prevailing torque nuts. Leave bolts hand tight.
Attach right exhaust tube assembly to EGR cooler assembly with V-clamp. Do not tighten V-clamp.

figure.caption: Figure 99. Bolt and spacer for left exhaust manifold

step1.para: Apply antiseize compound to all bolt threads.

Install left exhaust manifold using eight M8 x 1.25 x 40 prevailing torque flanged-head bolts and spacers. Start with the second bolt from the rear on top. The hole diameter is smaller to allow alignment of the remaining bolts. Tighten bolts to specified torque and sequence .
Apply antiseize compound to threads of the EBP sensor tube fitting. Install EBP sensor tube to exhaust manifold and tighten fitting to the special torque .

Apply antiseize compound to the threads of two M8 x 30 bolts and prevailing torque nuts. Install a new exhaust tube gasket and secure the shielded tube exhaust assembly (upper right side) to the right exhaust tube assembly. Leave nuts and bolts hand tight.

figure.caption: Figure 102. Mounting bolts for shielded tube exhaust assembly on left exhaust manifold

step1.para: Apply antiseize compound to two M8 x 60 bolts securing the shielded tube exhaust assembly to the exhaust manifold flange. Leave bolts hand tight.
After turbocharger installation, torque all related turbocharger tubing in the following order:

step2.para: Shielded exhaust tube assembly at right exhaust tube (upper flange)
Shielded exhaust tube assembly at left manifold
Exhaust tube assembly at right manifold
